hooks.Hook_Line: Ever notice your anxiety waits until 2 a.m. to show up?
hooks.Visual_Prompt: Night shot. Woman in her 40s, soft natural look, lying in bed on her side. Only light is the cold blue glow from her phone and a digital clock showing 2:07 a.m. She stares at the ceiling, thumb frozen mid-scroll.
hooks.VO: Ever notice your anxiety waits until 2 a.m. to show up?
hooks.Audio / script: Ever notice your anxiety waits until 2 a.m. to show up?
hooks.Text Overlay: 2:07 a.m. And your brain won’t shut off.

script_scenes.Visual_Prompt: Same woman sighs, puts phone face-down. Camera close on hand opening bedside drawer labeled “Pharmacy.” Inside: almost empty prescription bottle, crumpled side-effect sheet. She closes it, then opens second drawer labeled “Home Apothecary” with The Forgotten Home Apothecary, a small jar of dried herbs, and a tea mug.
script_scenes.VO: When my brain starts sprinting at 2 a.m., this used to be the only drawer I had. Now I open this one instead.
script_scenes.Audio / script: When my brain starts sprinting at 2 a.m., this used to be the only drawer I had. Now I open this one instead.
script_scenes.Text Overlay: Swap panic drawer → calm drawer

script_scenes.Visual_Prompt: Over-shoulder shot as she flips The Forgotten Home Apothecary open to the Nervous System section. Camera slowly pans across shelf-style table of contents: “For racing thoughts,” “For middle-of-the-night waking,” “For knot-in-your-chest days.” Her fingertip taps each label.
script_scenes.VO: The Forgotten Home Apothecary lays everything out like an old apothecary shelf. I just pick what I need… ‘racing thoughts,’ ‘middle-of-the-night waking,’ ‘knot-in-your-chest days.’
script_scenes.Audio / script: The Forgotten Home Apothecary lays everything out like an old apothecary shelf. I just pick what I need… ‘racing thoughts,’ ‘middle-of-the-night waking,’ ‘knot-in-your-chest days.’

script_scenes.Visual_Prompt: Close-up of one calming sleep remedy page. Camera glides down the sections as her finger traces: Ingredients, Step-by-step Instructions, Dosage, Side Effects & Allergies, Interactions with Medications. Quick inserts of her gently dropping herbs into a mug and pouring hot water.
script_scenes.VO: Every remedy has clear ingredients, step-by-step instructions, exact dosage, even side effects and medication interactions. So I’m not guessing in the middle of the night.
script_scenes.Audio / script: Every remedy has clear ingredients, step-by-step instructions, exact dosage, even side effects and medication interactions. So I’m not guessing in the middle of the night.
script_scenes.Text Overlay: Not random internet tips. A bedside manual.

script_scenes.CTA_Line: Peek inside the book before it’s gone again.
script_scenes.Visual_Prompt: Soft lamplight. She sits up in bed, sipping tea, phone screen dark on the nightstand. Camera lingers on the book cover: The Forgotten Home Apothecary. Her hand rests on it, calm. Subtle music fades warm and low.
script_scenes.VO: This isn’t another app or subscription. It’s 250 photographed remedies in one book, on your nightstand, whenever your brain decides it’s time to panic.
script_scenes.Audio / script: This isn’t another app or subscription. It’s 250 photographed remedies in one book, on your nightstand, whenever your brain decides it’s time to panic. Tap below to peek inside before it’s gone again.
